perturbation.original_text:
ARTICLE FOUR SERVICE FEE

4.1 The amount of the service fee and its terms of payment shall be as set forth in Attachment 1 to the “Agreement Between Phoenix Satellite TV and Phoenix New Media Regarding Cooperation in the Fields of Content, Branding, Promotion and Technology” dated November 24, 2009 between Phoenix Satellite Television Holdings Limited and Phoenix Online (Beijing) Information Technology Co., Ltd. (“Phoenix Online”).
perturbation.changed_text:
ARTICLE FOUR SERVICE FEE

4.1 The amount of the service fee will be mutually agreed upon by both parties.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the reference to Attachment 1, the contract now states that service fees will be mutually agreed upon. However, the original language commits to having the fee schedule detailed in Attachment 1. This removes the specific fee structure and creates a contractual ambiguity regarding the payment terms, which contradicts any implied commitment to the previous arrangement. Later disputes will arise on the fees, since that are not clearly defined.
